title: George Washington

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- During the day, call some minutemen to a player's house. If they're good, it is revealed to you. If they're not, attack them. 4 charges.
- During the night, you may prep to ambush the REF. It has a 25% chance to work, but if it does, you will kill a random REF member and reset the chance to 25%. If it doesn't, the chance increases by 5% the next night until you succeed.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - This role can only be rolled by Americans

desc:
Post 4202
*It is better to be alone than in bad company.*
